segments.text: So it's down to these two, Nancy I know you like this one and I think I agree. Rachel, what do you think?
segments.speaker: Kim

segments.text: Well umm, that one is pretty but uh, I just, I just love this fabric  Sorry.
segments.speaker: Rachel

segments.text: Oh don't be sorry, that's part of your job here to give your opinions and then I take credit for them--I'm kidding.
segments.speaker: Kim

segments.text: She is kidding, but don't ever disagree with her again. Okay, now I'm kidding!
segments.speaker: Nancy

segments.text: I don't know which one, but I do know I need a cigarette.
segments.speaker: Kim

segments.text: So what do you say we take a break, we go outside, and we'll figure this out when we come back?
segments.speaker: Kim

segments.text: Oh no, my dad's a doctor and he would always tell me just horror stories......about ghosts and goblins who totally supported the princess's right to smoke.
segments.speaker: Rachel
